turn.2: Forest City Cemetery Forest City Cemetery is a cemetery in South Portland, Maine, owned and operated by the adjacent city of Portland.

turn.4: There are approximately 30,000 burials in the cemetery.
turn.6: Forest City's burial records are kept at Evergreen Cemetery in Portland.
